activities: Unified Social obtains personal data such as email address and telephone number from clients.  The purpose for such processing is to upload the data onto social networking platforms pursuant to running advertising campaigns on the social networking platforms. Unified also offers a social sharing tool that collects social media profile ID's and - in some instances - social media user names. As a data processor, Unified uses this data only as directed by our clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted by Unified's customers, data collected pursuant to delivering advertisements (to the extent that it considered personal data)
privacyprograms: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program
